title: notocactus
author: notocactus
content: lightlord has personal issues (likely with his health) as he revealed one year ago and he is very little actively on the forum. His last active day is October 07, 2022.Quote from: lightlord on January 26, 2022, 02:16:46 PMThings have been very difficult after the second vaccination shot, affected in ways that were unforeseen. With continued weight loss all the way to Dec. I've since gained 10 pounds, more strength, and health.Recently I saw many posters made many posts in Bitvest.io thread and I think those posts are like spamming. If possible, I'd ask admins or moderators to temporarily lock that thread with a note for lightlord that if he is active again, DM admins to unlock the thread.If any poster want to discuss about it, create a discussion thread in Gambling discussion child board.If admin approves my proposal, please consider to lock 777coin thread too.

comments.author: BitcoinGirl.Club
comments.body: Is any of the site out of business?In the gambling board if these two topics deserve a temp lock then I think most of other threads too. Show me an old gambling mega thread where users are not spamming. I am one of them (FTFS), are you not?I am not against preventing spams but you can not lock a thread (may be you can just because mods have the access to do it) of a running business while others have the same elements to argue. Make it a fair playground to play not because lightlord said something some times ago.

Ideally, lightlord himself should quickly come online (if he is able to) and post a note of temporary closure on both the thread and website with a method for existing balances to withdraw to relieve himself of his responsibilities without any damage until his health improves enough for him to be comfortable to continue running the business.

comments.author: Stalker22
comments.body: Quote from: Sandra_hakeem on February 15, 2023, 10:12:01 PMbut my suggestions is - that those threads get locked, until further resolutions.But why? There are other threads that do not have an active casino representative on the forum. Why should we treat Bitvest thread differently? I think it is important to have consistency in how moderatos manage different threads, and spam should be treated on a post-by-post basis.Regarding LightLord's health, it is important to respect people's privacy and not discuss personal matters unless they directly affect the operation of the service. While he may have declared an illness in the past, he resumed posting on the forum months later, so it is reasonable to assume that his health has improved since then. And, apart from that, there is also Zodiac1233.
